acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle generics in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleGenericsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.GenericInConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 2_nanmBAL2
